channel.title: Tops on LP's BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on LP's BLOG

item.description: Li Peng is a Front End Developer and a Pharmacist. What he wants to do is to apply CS on pharmacy. He has experiences in Front End Developing and Pharmaceutical industry for a couple of years. He always believes that a good attitude is the basis of doing anything well. Keeping a passion for technics is natural to him. He also has a lot of interests. While he is free, he likes keeping fit, playing the guitar, playing basketball and so on.
FE Manual 发展很快，每个人都需要不断地重塑对应的知识体系 保证知识的完备性 面对质疑，怎么提升自己才是关键的，我们只要不断学习，凭实力说话，自然就能赢
